trait.name: Arrow Bane
text: When the wind demon is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a 6, the wind demon is unaffected, and the attack is reflected back at the attacker as though it originated from the wind demon, turning the attacker into the target.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The wind demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The wind demon makes two frost claw attacks.

action.name: Frost Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

reaction.name: Swift as Frost
text: After a creature the wind demon can see damages it with an attack, the wind demon can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
